column4: Anyone know how to "stretch" my screen out? Ubuntu had made it much smaller, lots of black on left and right of screen
You need to set x to your lcd's navice resolution.
how do I go about that?
Ah yes i thought so, it only lets me go to 1024 x 768 as my graphics card isnt installed yet (working on it still but i dont know linux command line very well yet)
Go to System -> Administration -> Hardware Drivers and install the driver from there.
type in a terminal      sudo apt-get install linux-restricted-modules
and then       sudo aptitude install restricted-manager
It says Couldn't find package linux-restricted-modules
What does it say when you type in a terminal    uname -r
Why don't you update your kernel?
I wouldnt know how lol, I am very new to linux,
Go to System -> Administration -> Update Manager
Click on Check and Install Updates
You will need to restart the computer after it finishes installing the updates.
